name: WellDown
description:
Make it to the bottom if you dare!

A unique take on a classic IOS game

Controls: WASD, space, mouse

If you get to the end of the level (signified by a lack of anything) you've reached the end!

Colors:

Blue - Player

Red - Monster, kill it! It's either a jelly or a frog.

Orange - Breakable block

Yellow - One way platform

Green - Item (No functionality added yet)
